TopicTitle: Hello, i unsubrscriped from fb recently

Articles.Content:
Hello ksp forum, i'm Federico Canale aka Sturmtruppen

has anyone some tips and tricks to be a good forum member?

(p.s. please why i can't choose a signature and a prophile photo?)

You need to post a few more times before the forum software believes you are not a spambot, and then you will have permission to customize your profile. And here's somebody who's got some tips on good citizenship. Welcome to the forum.
KSP Forum Good Conduct Guide

Welcome to the forum! Your first few post need to be checked so that we know that you're not trying to flood our forum with spam, then you will have the privileges of a normal member! To be a good and friendly member, read the rules and good conduct guide!
